TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ActivityContext extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.Diagnostics.ActivityContext>
Public Structure ActivityContext Implements IEquatable(Of ActivityContext)

summary.span: 符合 W3C TraceContext 规范的表示形式。

span.span: A representation that conforms to the W3C TraceContext specification.

summary.span: 它包含两个标识符：一个 TraceId 和一个 SpanId，以及一组常见的 TraceFlag 和特定于系统的 TraceState 值。

span.span: It contains two identifiers: a TraceId and a SpanId, along with a set of common TraceFlags and system-specific TraceState values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ActivityContext 包含属性 `IsRemote` ，该属性不是 W3C 的组成部分。ActivityContext contains the property `IsRemote`, which is not part of W3C. `IsRemote` 指示上下文是否从远程父项传播。`IsRemote` is indicating if the context is propagated from a remote parent.
